thread.title: Lara Dutta: Life now revolves around my daughter
thread.title_full: Lara Dutta: Life now revolves around my daughter - Entertainment

author: PTI
title: Lara Dutta: Life now revolves around my daughter
text:
Making a comeback on the silver screen with "Singh is Bling", actress Lara Dutta says her life now revolves around her three-year-old daughter Saira.

Lara Dutta 
"My life now revolves around my daughter. I am a hands on mother. I have a responsibility towards my job and family.
When we go out on a holiday, we see to it there is a play zone.
"Now that Saira is three-year-old, Mahesh (Bhupathi) and I got time to go on a holiday once in last three years. We both like indulging in spa," Lara told PTI.
The 37-year-old former Miss Universe married tennis star Mahesh Bhupathi in 2011 and took sabbatical post the birth of their daughter in 2012.
The actress is now excited for her new innings as a brand advocate for a hotel chain.
Lara will create content and share her wellness and fitness choices on social media channels, as a part of her new role.
When asked about the do's list for a holiday, she said, "I would advise everyone to get a proper sleep of at least seven to eight hours, eat right, work out, do yoga, play well, indulge in spa."
